generalSessions.name: Williamson County General Sessions Court
generalSessions.parking: Free public parking available around courthouse

municipal.name: Franklin Municipal Court
municipal.note: Handles city ordinance and traffic violations within Franklin city limits

suburbanMunicipal.description: Suburban municipalities have their own courts

cities.name: Spring Hill City Court
cities.address: 199 Town Center Pkwy, Spring Hill, TN 37174

publicDefender.note: Available for indigent defendants in criminal traffic cases

process: City tickets: Contact Franklin Municipal Court
County tickets: Contact General Sessions Court
Enter not guilty plea to receive court date
File discovery request with court clerk
contestingTicket.onlinePayment: Available through City of Franklin and Williamson County websites

courtDates.scheduling: Court dates typically 4-6 weeks from arraignment
courtDates.continuances: Contact court clerk at least 48 hours before scheduled date
courtDates.noShow: Failure to appear may result in bench warrant and license suspension

diversionProgram.name: Williamson County Pre-Trial Diversion
requirements: Pay program fees and court costs

trafficSchool.deadline: Must complete within 90 days of court order

localRules.dressCode: Business casual; no shorts, tank tops, or hats

specialConsiderations.schoolZones: Enhanced fines in school zones; strictly enforced
specialConsiderations.interstateEnforcement: Heavy enforcement on I-65 through county

locations: Public parking around downtown Franklin square
parking.note: Historic downtown area; plan for walking

legalAid.name: Legal Aid Society - Franklin Office
legalAid.note: Free legal assistance for qualifying individuals

economicFactors.note: Williamson County is one of the wealthiest counties in Tennessee
economicFactors.courtFines: May be at higher end of typical ranges
economicFactors.diversionCosts: Program fees may be higher than other counties
